full_summary:
### W2037-240021 Milling Machines Request for Proposal

#### Solicitation Information
_______

* **Title (English/French):** W2037-240021 Milling Machines / Fraiseuses W2037-240021
* **Reference Number:** WS4318439258
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4318439258
* **Publication Date:** November 21, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date and Time:** December 20, 2023 at 14:00:00 HNE
* **Amendment Number:** 5
* **Amendment Date:** December 15, 2023

#### Procurement Information
_______

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Commodity Classification Groups:**
  * UNSPSC Code: 23242500, 23291600
  * UNSPSC Description: Metal milling machines, Industrial milling tools

#### Tender Requirements and Evaluation Criteria
_______

* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Limited Tendering Reason:** None
* **Area of Coverage:** Ontario (except National Capital Region)
* **Delivery Region:** Ontario (except National Capital Region)

#### Contracting Information
_______

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

#### Contact Information
_______

* **End User:** Department of National Defence
* **End User Address:** 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada
* **Contact Information:** Stanley Chui, (SPAC/PSPC) - stanley.chui@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
